title: [Main Menu][Layout] More Tiles - Gallery/More Grid View Launch on All Strands
custom_steps:
1) Access Main Menu
2) Scroll to the extreme left of the strand and observe
3) Select the more indicator, then observe
4) Return to the Main Menu by pressing Back on the remote
5) Navigate to the extreme right of the next strand and observe
6) Select the More (More Grid) indicator and observe
7) Repeat steps 4, 5, and 6 for all remaining strands
custom_expected:
Describes how the 'More' button exists on each strand and takes users to gallery view/More Grid View of the strand.
The "More" tile is a button that performs 'Go to gallery/More button' action when it is focused
If the user holds down the D-Pad 'right' key, the "More" tile will be focused (if there).
Every strand on the main menu has a 'More' option at the end except Timeline strand which has More button on the far left end
Gallery view/More Grid View loads
Some of the strands like My Shows needs at least 7 programs in order to show More button on he strand.
Have watched and favorited at least 7 programs

title: [Main Menu][Layout] Main Menu Layout
custom_steps:
1) Observe Timeline Strand
2) Press down on D-pad to navigate to "My Shows" strand
3) Press down on D-pad to navigate to "Favorite Channels"
4) Press down on D-pad to navigate to "Live TV"
5) Press down on D-pad to navigate to "Recommended"
6) Press down on D-pad to navigate to "Featured"
custom_expected: Access Vertical Menu's multiple strands Preconditions  Content playing in the background All strands are fully populated with tiles that exceeds the allocated tile space to force a more button and gallery view.

title: [Live TV Strand] Loads content
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down 3 strands (pressing down on d-pad)
2) Select any tile on Live TV strand by navigating across the stand and selecting it after a tile is focused
custom_expected: Access Vertical Menu's multiple strands Preconditions  Content playing in the background All strands are fully populated with tiles that exceeds the allocated tile space to force a more button and gallery view.

title: [Live TV Strand] Content Availability ***MAY NOT BE ABLE TO TEST***
custom_preconds: Have content subscription list to compare subscription
custom_steps:
1) Using profile 1 with lowest subscription option, access main menu
2) Navigate down 1 strand (pressing down on d-pad)
3) Navigate across the strand and observe the content
4) Log out of profile 1 and log in with profile 2
5) Using profile 2 with medium subscription option, access main menu
6) Navigate down 1 strand (pressing down on d-pad)
7) Navigate across the strand and observe the content
8) Log out of profile 2 and log in with profile 3
9) Using profile 3 with medium subscription option, access main menu
10) Navigate down 1 strand (pressing down on d-pad)
11) Navigate across the strand and observe the content
custom_expected:
Live TV Horizontal Navigation Bar lists 14 content that is available from the User's subscription

Note: We had a defect on Sep Testrun and now it is fixed and closed.

We don't have any spec that specifically tell us the rules on how many tiles needs to be populating in each strand and each subsection. Waiting for Chris to get back to us on that one.

title: [Live TV Strand] No Duplicates
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to 'Live TV' strand by using the dpad down button 3 times
2) Observe tiles while navigating right until you reach the end of the strand
custom_expected: Live TV subsection should not display duplicate content (more than 1 time in each section). content is available on multiple channels, i.e. sports, selecting the tile will load option to select which channel to watch on

title: [Live TV Strand] Live Badge Icon found in Gallery
custom_steps:
1) Navigate to the Live TV strand
2) Scroll the the extreme right to access the live gallery
3) Observe the tile in the gallery
custom_expected: Verifying that all currently airing programs in the 'Live TV' strand displays the Live badge

title: [Main Menu][Layout] Content UX - Gallery/more grid view Section Tile Count
custom_preconds: Have gallery/more grid view with multiple tiles, more than 20+, so that the scrolling can be displayed
custom_steps:
1) Access any gallery/more grid view
2) Observe section title count
3) Navigate down to the end of the gallery/more grid view
custom_expected: Ensure the Gallery's section tile count exist and accurate

title: [Main Menu][Layout] More Tiles - Creation and Exist
custom_steps:
1) Navigate to My Shows by pressing down button on dpad 1 time
2) Observe empty strand
3) Access live TV strand
4) Add different shows to My Shows strand by going to program details page. 
5) Navigate back to My Shows strand
6) Navigate to the right end of the strand
custom_expected: Describes how the 'More' button exist only when there are more tiles to view compared to what is displayed on the strand.

title: [Main Menu][Timeline Strand] Highlight-memory between strands
custom_steps:
1) Move the highlight to any position on the timeline strand other than the default
2) Navigate to another strand
3) Navigate back to the original strand and observe
4) Repeat steps 2-4 for each subsequent strand
custom_expected: To ensure that the application recalls the highlight to where it was when scrolling back to a strand

title: [Live TV Strand] Available program playback, Gallery Access
custom_steps:
1) Load live gallery
2) Scroll to any available episode, press Select and observe
custom_expected:
To ensure that any program in Live TV gallery is playable. 
With one further tap of the cross button, I can then play the program I chose

title: [Channel Strand][Favorite Channels] Subsections - Favorite, Recent, All Channels
custom_steps:
1) Press down button on dpad to the Channels section
2) Navigate RIGHT on the Channels strand
custom_expected:
To ensure that each subsection is present

[ ]Order of tiles in "Channels" strand should be:
[ ]Favorite Channels (Max 10)[ ]Recent Channels (Max 5)
[ ]All Channels (remaining slots filled)

title: [Channel Strand][Favorite Channel] When no program is Favorited.
custom_preconds: User need to have an account with no program in favorite.
custom_steps: 1) Navigate down using 'down' button on dpad to Channel Strand
custom_expected:
To ensure that the channel strand can handle there being no Favorited channels. User needs to use an account that has not favorited any channel. OR remove all the favorite channels to be able to see the tile.

Acceptance: If no Favorite Channels are present, display "Add Favorite Channels"

title: [Channel Strand][Favorite Channels] No Duplicate
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to 'Channels' strand 
2) Observe tiles while navigating right, until you reach the end of the strand
custom_expected:
To ensure that the channels strand doesn't show multiple instances of the same tile

[ ]Channel Favorites is the first section within the Channels Strand at the bottom on Vertical Navigation Bar.
[ ]Selecting focused tiles will load channel detail page .

title: [Channel Strand][Favorite Channels] 10 Tiles under Favorite Channel
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to the 'Channels' strand
2) Navigate RIGHT on dpad to the end of the strand
custom_expected:
To ensure that the Channel strand is displaying the correct number of favorite channels 

[ ] A total of 15 channel tiles displayed in the strand
[ ] Order of tiles in "Channels" strand should be: 
Favorite Channels , Recent Channel and All Channels

Acceptance:

[ ]Up to 10 tiles allocated to "Favorite Channels"
[ ]Order of tiles in "Channels" strand should be:
Favorite Channels (Max 10)
Please see Rules in Closed Defect D28702 if confused

title: [Channel Strand] Channels Strand Changes - all channels subsection shrinks as items are added to others
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to Channels strand and observe the subsections
2) Navigate down to LiveTV strand
3) Select any program and make note of the channel
4) Repeat steps 3 and 4 an additional 3 times to add the maximum of recent channels
5) Navigate down to Channels strand and observe the subsections
6) Navigate down to LiveTV strand
7) Select a program to access the Program details page
8) Scroll to and select the 'favorite' button add the channel as a favorite
9) Repeat steps 8-11 an additional 9 times to add the fill up the favorite channels subsection
10) Navigate down to Channels strand and observe the subsections
custom_expected:
To ensure that All Channels takes up whatever strand space that is remaining 
Acceptance:
[ ]A total of 15 channel tiles displayed in the strand[ ]Up to 10 tiles allocated to "Favorite Channels"
[ ]Up to 5 tiles allocated to "Recent Channels"
[ ]Any tile slots available will be allocated for "All Channels"  
Please see Rules in Closed Defect D28702 if confused
https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/29986545616d/detail/defect/43627743471

title: [Channel Strand][Recent Channels] Subsection Expands with use
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down via the 'down' button on DPad or left stick to the bottom strand
2) Scroll focus to the right until the Recent channels subsection is in view and note the number of tiles in this section
3) Navigate down via the 'down' button on the DPad to the Live TV strand and select any new currently airing show
4) Access the main menu by selecting Menu button on Fire TV remote.
5) Repeat steps 5 and 6 an additional 4 times and observe the Recent Channels sub section of the Channels strand
custom_expected:
Note: The channel strand has a 10 minute timer on it. Please check after 10 minutes.[ ]A total of 15 channel tiles displayed in the strand
[ ]Up to 10 tiles allocated to "Favorite Channels"
[ ]Up to 5 tiles allocated to "Recent Channels"
[ ]Order of tiles in "Channels" strand should be Recent Channels (Max 5)
Please see Rules in Closed Defect D28702 if confused
https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/29986545616d/detail/defect/43627743471

title: [Channel Strand] All channels sorted with local channels and national channels alphabetical
custom_steps: Navigate down to the bottom and observe the All Channels subsection
custom_expected:
Noting the order of the tiles in the all channels subsection

Acceptance:
[ ]"All Channels" should be sorted by:

[ ]Local channels first (sort on channel number ascending)
[ ]National channels (sort on channel title ascending)

title: [Channel Strand] Channel Strand Gallery - Select action
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to the Favorite Channels strand
2) Scroll right to hover over the 'More' tile
3) Scroll to any tile in any section and select
custom_expected:
To ensure that all tiles launch channels detail pages
Acceptance:

[ ]The Gallery loads from the More tile on the Main Menu 'Channels' Strand
[ ]Gallery contains 3 sections
[ ]Favorite Channels
[ ]Recent Watched
[ ]All Channels

title: [Channel Strand] Channel Strand Gallery - All Channels default sort
custom_steps:
1) Navigate to the Favorite Channels strand
2) Scroll right to focus over the 'More' tile
3) Scroll down to the All channels subgallery via the DPad
4) Observe the order that the tiles appear in
custom_expected:
To ensure that the gallery honors the ordered local channels preceding alphabetically national channels sort of the strand
Acceptance:

[ ]The Gallery loads from the More tile on the Main Menu 'Channels' Strand
[ ]Gallery contains 3 sections
[ ]Favorite Channels
[ ]Recent Watched
[ ]All Channels

title: [N/A][Main Menu][Timeline Strand] Favorite a tile in Gallery view of Timeline strand
custom_steps:
1) Launch App and Access Main Menu
2) Navigate left to 'More' and load gallery
3) Focus on any program tile that is not already in My Shows and press R1
This step will need to be updated once the controller mappings have been decided.
custom_expected: Favorite a tile in gallery view

title: [Main Menu][Timeline Strand] Recently Watched - All show history is saved on recently watched show gallery/more grid view
custom_steps:
1) Search and watch 3 different shows in orders A, B, C, watching A first and C last
2) Load recently watched gallery/more grid
3) Observe show order in gallery/more grid
custom_expected:
All the user's watch history is displayed in the gallery/more grid view

[ ]Order of the video by default is most recently watched to less recently watch from Left corner to right and down
Note: Rally Defect D27967
https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/29986545616d/detail/defect/43049347099

title: [Main Menu][Timeline Strand][Gallery/More grid] Recently Watched - All show history is saved on Recently Watched show gallery and displays after exiting/returing to the app/
custom_steps:
1) Search and watch 3 different shows in orders A, B, C, watching A first and C last
2) Load recently watched gallery/more grid
3) Observe show order in gallery/more grid
4) Exit app, log out and turn off Fire TV Box/Stick
5) Turn on Fire TV Box/Stick and load Destro app
6) Load recently watched gallery/more grid
custom_expected: Describes how the recently watched show is populated by user's historical programing We had a defect for this testcase For Sep Test Run, now has been fixed and closed. Rally Defect D27967  https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/29986545616d/detail/defect/43049347099

title: [Main Menu][Timeline Strand] Recently Watched - Immediate add to Recently Watched history after a show is played and stopped.
custom_steps:
1) Search and watch show A for 1 second and pause
2) Search and watch show B for 5 seconds and pause
3) Search and watch show C for 5 minutes
4) Load recently watched gallery
custom_expected: Describes how the recently watched show is populated by user's historical programing Note: We had a defect for this testcase For Sep Test Run, now has been fixed and closed. Rally Defect D27967 https://rally1.rallydev.com/#/29986545616d/detail/defect/43049347099

title: [Featured Strand] No playable content
custom_steps:
1) Navigate to Featured strand, by pressing down button on dpad 5 times
2) Select any tile on the featured strand by moving right on the strand using dpad right arrow
custom_expected: Tiles in this strand does not load onto videoplay.Instead, when selected, the tile will load the detail page

title: [Featured Strand] no duplicate
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to 'Featured' strand by using the dpad down button 2 times
2) Observe tiles while navigating right, pressing the right dpad button, until you reach the end of the strand
custom_expected: Featured subsection should not display duplicate content

title: [N/A][Featured Strand] Favorite a tile in gallery view ***incomplete need to finish***
custom_steps: Focus on any program tile that is not already in My Shows and press R 1This step will need to be updated once the remote mappings have been decided.
custom_expected: Roku does not support it this way so will need to rewrite

title: [My Shows Strand] My Shows Strand - Selection
custom_steps:
1) Navigate to the My Shows Strand
2) Select any tile
3) Exit out of program details page and observe
custom_expected: This test describes how selecting the tiles in the My Shows strand loads the content detail page

title: [My Shows Strand] No Favorite
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to 'My Shows' strand
2) Press the tile
custom_expected: Describes situation when no My Shows have been added

title: [My Shows Strand] No Duplicate
custom_steps:
1) Navigate down to 'My Shows' strand
2) Observe tiles while navigating right, pressing the right arrow pdad button, until you reach the end of the strand
3) Access the My Shows gallery and observe
custom_expected: Tiles are not duplicated more than 1 time in each section

title: [N/A][My Shows Strand] Favorite a tile in gallery view
custom_steps:
1) Navigate to the My Shows strand
2) Navigate to 'more' and load a gallery
3) Focus on any tile and press R1
This step will need to be updated once the remote mappings have been decided. 
4) Click on Yes
5) On the same tile, press R1 again
custom_expected: Favorite a tile in gallery view
